mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CSTM_CQRS(CSTM_ID, CSTM_NM, CSTM_AGE, CSTM_GND, CSTM_PN, CSTM_ADR) VALUES(#{cstmId}, #{cstmNm}, #{cstmAge}, #{cstmGnd}, #{cstmPn}, #{cstmAdr})
